tooltip.toolcraft.block.block_of_titaniu: §7§oReinforced material for building strong walls and secure fasteners.
tooltip.toolcraft.titanium_sword.tooltip: §7§oHeavy, strong, and reliable, it becomes an indispensable ally in battles and helps defeat any foe.
tooltip.toolcraft.titanium_axe.tooltip.s: §7§oPowerful, durable, and sharp, it quickly fells trees and other materials.
tooltip.toolcraft.titanium_shovel.toolti: §7§oConvenient, lightweight, and sturdy, it allows for fast digging of soil, sand, and gravel.
tooltip.toolcraft.titanium_pickaxe.toolt: §7§oSharp, powerful, and long-lasting, this pickaxe can mine even the toughest materials in Minecraft.
tooltip.toolcraft.titanium_hoe.tooltip.s: §7§oLight, durable, and sharp, it easily tills soil ready for planting.
